name: Spiky Harold
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy Color. Original version: Andrew Rogers and Commodore 16 conversion by Simon Sorsbie - Firebird Software, Commodore 16/Plus4, 1986. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5!

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!

You must help Spiky Harold to prepare for hibernation. Each of the chambers beneath the Hedgerow contains an item of food which Harold can eat. However, he must avoidthe creatures who will try to stop him. On his travels, Harold may find some coins which will give him extra lives, and wine glasses that will make him drunk (the creatures will be faster). When you have helped Harold to collect ALL the objects, he must be guided to his home cavern where he can hibernate.

Move: Cursor Keys
Jump: B 

Move: Arrow Keys
Jump: X

Spiky Harold - Firebird Software

Creators webpage (WLS): Spiky Harold
